attributes.action: Oppose Complete Metrification and Leave Things the Way they Are
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A majority of the country opposes complete metrification. I do not want to be driving along the motorway or main road and see distances in KM, I am used to miles and I am not changing that just because the EU says so. I also standardisation with beer, milk etc is ridiculous. Just leave things the way they are; metric for some things, imperial for others.
